name: Tim OHagan
summary: Innovative and detail-oriented software engineering professional with light full-stack experience developing ReactJS UI components and API components built on a Spring framework at Walmart Global Tech. Well-versed in Scrum and Agile methodology, with experience building full-scale applications in the healthcare and accounting spaces. Strategic professional adept at planning projects and identifying areas for optimization.
summary2: In addition to my work at Walmart Global Tech, I actively pursue personal projects to further expand my full-stack capabilities and deepen my understanding of the software development lifecycle.

tasks.title: Software engineer on Walmart’s health clinic patient communications project and Walmart’s Social Determinants of Health (SDOH) project, including contributing to development of Java Spring RESTful API middleware service.
details: Participated in planning of SDOH member experience workflow.
Contributed to development of ReactJS modules.
Collaborated with QE team to implement automated tests using JavaScript.
Planned and implemented new middleware service.

tasks.title: Served as developer on Financial Technology and Accounting team.
details: Gained experience working in Agile and Scrum environment.
Participated in full software development lifecycle.
Collaborated with team proficient in JavaScript, React, Node, Cosmos DB, Scala, and Kotlin to adopt and implement best practices.

tasks.title2: Progressive career advancement within the retail industry, culminating in leadership roles as Assistant Store Manager and Department Manager at Walmart (2018-2023). Consistently exceeded performance expectations, driving sales growth and fostering positive customer experiences. Proven ability to lead and motivate teams, resolve complex issues, and ensure operational efficiency.  Prior to retail management, gained valuable experience in various roles within a housewares wholesale company, including operations coordination, buying, product management, and product development (2006-2018).

education.degree: BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE
